item.title: Elixir and Nerves beginner workshop
item.description: Have you ever looked at Elixir and thought, this looks like a nice language with great features. This is a language that I want to know! Have you ever thought about toying with a raspberry pi or an arduino, playing with some leds, buttons, but never got around to it thinking it would take too much time to start with it. Maybe you’re just interested in functional programming or you want to learn a new programming language?
